a.n: The Invitation: Sienna Day, Alexei Jackson, Max Deeds & Emma Leigh

p.k: Jane and Tom decide to pack the kids off and book a romantic weekend away. When their car unexpectedly breaks down late at night they find themselves knocking on a stranger's door only to be presented with an invitation to a swingers party. Thrown in at the deep end Jane and Tom now have to navigate their way through unchartered waters. Will they take the plunge? A Joybear film.
